activities.name: Fotografiska
activities.description: A museum dedicated to photography, with exhibitions by both established and emerging photographers.

activities.name: Södermalmstorgs kaj
activities.description: A beautiful walk along the quay with a great view of the water and cityscape.

activities.name: Gallerian
activities.description: A large shopping mall with a wide range of shops and restaurants.

activities.name: Gamla Stan
activities.description: The historic city center of Stockholm, known for its picturesque alleys and historic buildings.

activities.name: Moderna Museet
activities.description: A museum focusing on contemporary art, with works by both Swedish and international artists.

activities.name: Tantolunden
activities.description: A park on Södermalm with green areas and walking paths, perfect for relaxation and birdwatching.

activities.name: Tantogården
activities.description: A recreational area, including mini golf and other outdoor activities.

activities.name: Långholmen
activities.description: An island with green areas and beaches, perfect for relaxation and picnics.

activities.name: Under Kastanjen
activities.description: A cozy café in Gamla Stan, known for its delicious pastries and atmosphere.

activities.name: Skansen
activities.description: An open-air museum and zoo showcasing Swedish history and culture through various historical buildings and animal species.
